ygData.subject: Re: Help in dueling
ygData.msgSnippet: All yeah have to do to get your pet to help yeah, Fear! They usually stay feared enough to cast your pet. I slaughtered a 24 Cleric, my necro was 24 at the
ygData.messageBody:
All yeah have to do to get your pet to help yeah, Fear! They usually stay feared enough to cast your pet. I slaughtered a 24 Cleric, my necro was 24 at the same time also, he was powerless against me. Can't hide from a pet either ;)


- Araxen 27 Gnome Necro on Tunare
----- Original Message -----
From: Dark
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Sent: Wednesday, October 20, 1999 12:36 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Help in dueling


Pet's do not help in normal duels a least on the normal servers. As for strategies you needs to dot him up and then move back and forth behind them. Basically you run by the warrior or any melee class then when he turns around you run backwards by him. This keeps him from getting any solid hits in. Then later dot him again if need be or lifetap him and you have it won. Not to mention you also have the level 24 dd spell which is good to use if you can get it off, but all you really need is to dot and run back and forth. I beat a paladin who while fighting in freeport one of the passing cleric's decided to heal him. If you do this right you should not lose.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Fraal <mata_eq@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, October 19, 1999 3:23 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Help in dueling


Well all i know is I had a pet challenge someone to dual and when he attacked me my pet just stood there. WTF!??!?!

This was about a month or so ago, did they fix this?

Why didn't my pet help?

----- Original Message -----
From: Trizzen Do'Trevan
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Sent: Wednesday, October 20, 1999 11:05 AM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Help in dueling


Last night, I watched a level 26 necromancer with a
pet, get wiped off of the face of Norrath by a 24th
level ogre warrior. I have some strategies for necro
against caster, but how do you fight a warrior? The
necro could not get any of his spells of as the
warrior bashed/kicked/slashed him to death. The fight
took a while as the necro ran around without much
effect. End result, one dead necro, ogre at half
health. They only thing I could think of was sic pet,
shadow step, cast darkness, then proceed.

I guess I have two questions:

What strategy do you all use for necro vs warrior
type?

What strategy do you all use for necro vs caster type?

I am really curious to see what everyone says to this.

Thanks!

Darkmoon Somberlight
24th level necromancer Quellious
